name: io.github.billylui/temporal-cortex-mcp
description: 11 deterministic calendar tools â€” temporal context, scheduling, availability, and booking
title: Temporal Cortex Calendar MCP

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Google OAuth Client ID (required for Google Calendar)

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Google OAuth Client Secret (required if using Google Calendar)

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_OAUTH_CREDENTIALS
environmentVariables.description: Path to Google OAuth JSON credentials file (alternative to CLIENT_ID + SECRET)

environmentVariables.name: MICROSOFT_CLIENT_ID
environmentVariables.description: Azure AD app ID (required for Outlook Calendar)

environmentVariables.name: MICROSOFT_CLIENT_SECRET
environmentVariables.description: Azure AD client secret (required for Outlook Calendar)

environmentVariables.name: TIMEZONE
environmentVariables.description: IANA timezone override (e.g., America/New_York). Overrides stored config and OS detection.

environmentVariables.name: WEEK_START
environmentVariables.description: Week start day: 'monday' (default, ISO 8601) or 'sunday'. Overrides stored config.

environmentVariables.name: TENANT_ID
environmentVariables.description: UUID for tenant isolation (auto-generated if not set)

environmentVariables.name: LOCK_TTL_SECS
environmentVariables.description: Lock time-to-live in seconds for booking safety

environmentVariables.name: OAUTH_REDIRECT_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port for the local OAuth callback server

environmentVariables.name: HTTP_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port for HTTP transport. When set, enables streamable HTTP mode instead of stdio.

environmentVariables.name: ALLOWED_ORIGINS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated allowed Origin headers for HTTP mode. Cross-origin requests rejected if unset.

environmentVariables.name: TEMPORAL_CORTEX_TELEMETRY
environmentVariables.description: Override telemetry consent: 'off' to disable, 'on' to enable anonymous usage analytics.

environmentVariables.name: REDIS_URLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated Redis URLs. When set, activates Platform Mode with distributed locking.
